meanings.sent1: I enjoy subwaying to work every day.
meanings.sent2: She is subwaying to the museum for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The penguin was subwaying to the fish market for a seafood feast.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were subwaying through her mind at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: Subwaying through the bustling city streets, he felt a sense of freedom.

meanings.definition: To construct or operate a subway system.
meanings.sent1: The city is subwaying a new underground train line.
meanings.sent2: They are subwaying a high-speed rail network in the region.
meanings.sent3: The ants were subwaying tunnels under the garden for their queen.
meanings.sent4: Ideas were subwaying in his mind, connecting different concepts together.
meanings.sent5: Subwaying beneath the surface, the roots of the tree spread far and wide.
